runs.comm: dropped, short and wide, slashes hard, gets a thick edge and North fails to cup it over his head, deflected off the fingers to the boundary, what a start
short and wide, punished, crashed through the covers for four, bowled at 144.8 kmph, picked the length early
good length on the off and moving away a hint, plays it hard and gets a thick edge to third man
short of a good length outside off, moving away, left alone to the keeper
quick, bowled at 145.8 kmph, dropped short of the bowler
came back in to beat him through the gate, stood tall to punch that through the off side but was almost done in by the inward movement
good length outside off, gets back and guides it down to third man
beaten through the gate came, cut back in sharply and he was made to look awkward, hanging his bat out only to be beaten
slower one bowled full on the off, driven cautiously to mid-off
too wide, chased it but it kept leaving him, another wide
charged down the track and went for a big heave over square leg, was not to the pitch, was struck on the ribs as he went after it
smashed through the covers, stayed his ground, seized on the width and bludgeoned it through the off side, raced away
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, dropped into the leg side off the front foot
too early into the shot, tried to drive it through cover, got a thick edge to third man
punched it off the back foot on the rise to cover, bowled at 139.6 kmph
came back in, good length on middle, defended solidly to mid-on, bowled at 146.4 kmph
a hint of desperation there, good length on middle and off, played an ugly swat but mistimed it to mid-off

banged in short on middle, went for the pull, mistimed it wide of midwicket, hit the high end of the bat and Laughlin dived full length to his left to pluck falling to his left. Shehzad stayed his ground to wait and check if he grassed it while making contact with the ground, but replays suggest the catch was clean
oversteps, good length outside off, pushed at it, got a thick edge behind point to third man, a massive no-ball that and it's time for a freehit
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, gets down on one knee to swat that over mid-on, mistimes it completely
back of a length on the off stump, came back in, chopped wide of point
short on the off, punched off the back foot to cover
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, pushed to cover
didn't time it all that well but did a good job to beat the gap between point and cover, short and wide, charged down the track and slapped it with a bit of a reach
bouncer banged in on middle, one for the over, was too high, not given a wide
two down! Short and wide, came down the track while making room simultaneously, slashed it hard but straight to Hopes at backward point who reached well to snap a sharp one
powerfully struck, slightly wide and he square-drove it with disdain through the point region, stood tall while playing it and it came off the middle
driven through the line to cover, but didn't time it well enough
on middle and off, defended off the back foot in the off side
fullish on the off stump, eased through the covers for a single
short of a good length outside off, played a little away from his body, dabbed it short of cover
short and wide and got the treatment, latched onto it quickly, making room and cutting it away between point and cover for four more
good length outside off, swats it down to mid-off where Hauritz fumbles to allow them a single
straying on the pads, poor line, flicked away behind square, well wide of fine leg for three runs, Misbah is away
back of a length on the off stump, eased away towards third man for a single
banged in short on middle and off, he ducks under it well
punched to cover off the back foot, slightly short on the off stump
good length outside off, makes room, and hits to wide of long-off
short of a length, outside off, and punched to cover
slower one, short outside off, is early into the shot and drags it to fine leg
short and wide, hops, and gets behind the line and opens the face towards third man
that's driven on the up, fullish outside off, and hit with an open face, but sweeper-cover means it will be only one
short on middle, kept a little low as he went for the pull, got his bat down just in time to get an inside edge onto his pads
slightly short outside off, bunts it straight to point, struck it well but straight to the fielder
back of a length on middle, defended to midwicket on the back foot
bouncer, took Misbah by surprise, was a little late into the hook, missed it and went over the bat to Haddin who appealed unconvincingly
short of a length on middle, defended with a straight bat to the bowler
getting some good bounce here, got behind it nicely, dropped it short of square leg and set off for a single immediately
tossed up outside off, took it on the half-volley and tried to drill it past midwicket, got an inside edge onto his pads
flighted outside off, got outside the line to clip it behind square, wide of deep square leg, for a couple
worked away towards long leg this time, fullish on middle and leg
tries to improvise, flighted outside off, tried to reverse-sweep it wide of point, was hit on the pads but just outside the line
poor ball, short and wide, made room to slash it hard behind point for a boundary to bring up Pakistan's 50
played for the spin and was beaten by the straighter one, landed on a good length outside off, tried to open the face, missed
angling it away from the right hander, tapped wide of Haddin for a quick single
on middle and off, eased to cover off the front foot
He's been harsh on anything short and wide, and this time's no exception, made room and cut it fiercely over point to beat third man to the boundary
walked down the pitch, fetched it from outside off and slapped it firmly short of mid-on
too close to cut, but short again, chopped down to third man
round the wicket to Misbah, dropped short of point
bowled flat outside off, taps it short of point for a quick single
flatter trajectory again, moves across and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
spinning in, defended off the front foot in the direction of square leg
gave him the charge even before the ball was bowled, drilled it down the ground past the bowler, Brett Lee ran yards to his left from long-on and dragged it back just inside the ropes
short of a length outside off, went for the cut, kept low, missed
tossed up on middle, reaches forward and bunts it down the ground to long-on
starts off with a wide down the leg side, tries to glance it fine, didn't have to, earns a run
on target this time, slightly short just outside off, pushed to cover
dropped, chipped it back to the bowler, a fairly straightforward chance, on a driving length but he wasn;t to the pitch, just pushed it firmly back to Hopes who spilled it on his follow through
comes down and swipes it towards deep midwicket for a couple more
pushed on the rise off the back foot towards cover
cashed in on a short one, banged in on middle, pulled away comfortably between fine leg and deep square leg for his first boundary
on middle and leg, gets forward and works it towards deep square leg for a single
straihgt on middle, clipped wide of short fine for a single
on middle and leg, turned to short fine, waited for it to spin into him
tossed up on the off stump, gets his left foot away and clubs it inside out between deep cover and long-off for a boundary
attempts a similar shot this time but fails to get to the pitch, gets a thick outside edge over point for a single
worked away off the front foot wide of midwicket
comes down the track and chips it towards long-on to keep the strike

banged in short on the off, pulled it away powerfully over long-on, went off the middle and though for a while it seemed he hadn't struck it well enough, it cleared the ropes quite comfortably in the end
even better, if the previous one was brute force, this one was beautifully timed, full on middle and leg, reached forward, bent low and paddled it over fine leg for another big one
back of a length outside off, mistimed a cut to cover
and again, too close to cut this time, hits the inside half of the bat as he tries to force that through the off side
worked away off the front foot through square leg
fullish on the off stump, gets to the pitch and drives it wide of deep cover for a couple, only a matter of time now
full toss on middle and leg, whipped away to deep midwicket to reach his fifty, excellent innings, saw off the pressure after the loss of the openers with a superb counterattack
banged in short outside leg stump, helped on its way to fine leg
low full toss on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket, failed to beat the gap there
good length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot towards mid-off for a quick single
length ball outside off, went for a massive heave over mid-on, ended up miscuing it in the direction of deep point where Lauglin dived forward but failed to reach it
short outside off, stood his ground, and slapped it with contempt into the stands over the bowler's head
on middle, swiped it to deep square leg, was looking to deposit that into the stands as well but didn't connect well enough
bouncer outside off, chases it from the crease, looks to upper cut it, misses
full outside leg stump, clipped to fine leg to level the scores
Misbah falls with his team on the brink, short on middle, looked to pull it behind square, got the top edge that landed safely in the hands of  Bracken at short fine
low full toss, bunts it straight to mid-off
fired in down the leg side, called a wide, sealing a comprehensive win for Pakistan
